Articles.Content:
I hit my Launcher for KSP, the Old version and it just sits there flashing "Searching for Updates" and does nothing!

Can't I keep the Old version and download 1.0 separately?

you can. You can download the 1.0 files from the KSP store as a zip, then replace your 0.90 data with the 1.0 stuff.

EDIT: it's the download that isn't labelled as an installer

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T02:14:32Z" title="04/30/2015 02:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by Reddeyfish**
